description: Mohan Bahadur Basnet is a Nepalese politician representing the Nepali Congress. He has served as a member of the Pratinidhi Sabha from Sindhupalchok and has held several ministerial roles, including Minister of Health and Population, Minister of Information and Communications, and Minister of State for Health. In May 2025, Basnet was charged in a corruption case by the CIAA concerning the Teramox telecom monitoring system, leading to his automatic suspension from Parliament.
short_description: Nepalese politician and former cabinet minister.
